statements: SELECT project_id, before_photo_url, after_photo_url FROM RenovationProject;
SELECT contractor_name, contractor_contact_info FROM RenovationProject;
SELECT project_id, material_cost_estimates FROM RenovationProject;
SELECT contractor_name, material_cost_estimates FROM RenovationProject WHERE contractor_name = 'ABC Construction';
SELECT project_id, contractor_name, contractor_contact_info FROM RenovationProject ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_id, contractor_name, material_cost_estimates FROM RenovationProject WHERE contractor_name = 'ABC Contractors' ORDER BY material_cost_estimates DESC;
SELECT * FROM RenovationProject WHERE material_cost_estimates > 5000 AND material_cost_estimates < 10000;
SELECT contractor_name, contractor_contact_info FROM RenovationProject WHERE material_cost_estimates BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT project_id, before_photo_url, after_photo_url FROM RenovationProject WHERE contractor_name LIKE 'XYZ%';
SELECT AVG(material_cost_estimates) AS avg_cost, MAX(material_cost_estimates) AS max_cost FROM RenovationProject;
SELECT * FROM before_after_photos;
SELECT photo_url, renovation_project_name FROM before_after_photos WHERE contractor_id = 100;
SELECT project_name, material_name, quantity, cost FROM material_cost_estimates WHERE cost > 500;
SELECT * FROM before_after_photos ORDER BY photo_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, sum(cost) AS total_cost FROM material_cost_estimates GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT photo_url, renovation_project_name FROM before_after_photos WHERE contractor_id = 1;
SELECT photo_url, renovation_project_name FROM before_after_photos WHERE contractor_id = 2 ORDER BY photo_url DESC;
SELECT project_name, material_name, cost FROM material_cost_estimates WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT project_name, SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM material_cost_estimates GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT project_name, AVG(cost) AS average_cost FROM material_cost_estimates WHERE quantity >= 50 GROUP BY project_name HAVING average_cost > 2000;
SELECT * FROM before_after_photos;
SELECT project_id, before_photo_url FROM before_after_photos WHERE id = 1;
SELECT contractor_name, contractor_specialty FROM contractor_information WHERE contractor_specialty = 'Plumbing';
SELECT id, material_item, estimated_cost FROM material_cost_estimates ORDER BY estimated_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM before_after_photos WHERE project_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM before_after_photos WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT contractor_name, contractor_specialty FROM contractor_information ORDER BY contractor_name DESC;
SELECT material_item, SUM(estimated_cost) AS total_cost FROM material_cost_estimates GROUP BY material_item;
SELECT * FROM before_after_photos LEFT JOIN material_cost_estimates ON before_after_photos.project_id = material_cost_estimates.project_id;
SELECT DISTINCT contractor_specialty FROM contractor_information ORDER BY contractor_specialty ASC;
SELECT * FROM project_details
SELECT contractor_name, contractor_specialty FROM contractor_information
SELECT before_photo_url, after_photo_url, renovation_date FROM before_and_after_photos
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM project_details WHERE end_date IS NULL
SELECT material_name, estimated_cost, estimate_date FROM material_cost_estimates ORDER BY estimated_cost DESC
SELECT * FROM project_details;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project_details WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT contractor_name, contractor_specialty, contact_number FROM contractor_information ORDER BY contractor_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, estimated_cost FROM material_cost_estimates WHERE estimated_cost > 5000;
SELECT before_photo_url, renovation_date FROM before_and_after_photos WHERE renovation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM renovation_projects;
SELECT contractor_name, contractor_phone FROM contractor_information WHERE contractor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM renovation_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT material_name, cost_estimate FROM material_cost_estimates ORDER BY cost_estimate DESC;
SELECT id, renovation_id, before_photo_url, after_photo_url FROM before_and_after_photos;
SELECT * FROM renovation_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT contractor_name, contractor_phone FROM contractor_information ORDER BY contractor_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM renovation_projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, cost_estimate FROM material_cost_estimates WHERE cost_estimate > 5000 ORDER BY cost_estimate DESC;
SELECT description, notes FROM renovation_details WHERE project_id = 3;
